summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4263 for the improvement of Thomas Street, from Fairview Avenue to a point approximately 190 feet west thereof; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 50665, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
